articles.description: As the road to recovery continues, Kane Williamson discussed the possibility of representing New Zealand at the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup in India.
articles.content: As the road to recovery continues, Kane Williamson discussed the possibility of representing New Zealand at the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup in India.In April, Kane Williamson underwent surgery to add… [+1785 chars]

articles.author: Mohammad Isam
articles.title: Shakib returns as Bangladesh ODI captain for Asia Cup and World Cup - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He last led Bangladesh in an ODI in 2017, and is now their captain in all three formats
articles.content: Tamim out of Asia Cup with back injury, steps down as ODI captain
